price: او چاته چې الله لارښوونه وكړي نو بيا يې څوك بې لارې كوونكى نشته، اّيا الله برلاسى غچ اخېستونکی نه دى؟
arabic: وَمَن يَهۡدِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن مُّضِلٍّۗ أَلَيۡسَ ٱللَّهُ بِعَزِيزٖ ذِي ٱنتِقَامٖ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: waman yahdi al-lahu famā lahu min muḍillin alaysa al-lahu biʿazīzin dhī intiqāmin
